description: With good friend Ty Thomas coming over, Paul Canon and his boyfriend Jackson Traynor prepare their den for a movie night. Ty brings his new roomie Dalton Briggs over with him. Ty and Paul cum so many times they lose count, and Jackson is happy he joined in as Dalton pounds him from behind, before pulling out to wet him down with a massive straight boy load all over his sweat drenched body. Paul and Jackson share a cum filled kiss as all four guys retire to sleep away their debaucherous fuck marathon. Enjoy!
